page.title: 04THE CHURCHES
page.content: Reverend Ivor Marsh is the Rector of "the Sampford Peverell Team Ministry" and Reverend Michael Boyes is the Vicar.Together they look after 7 churches.Rev.Marsh looks ater Burlescombe,Hockworthy and Holcombe Rogus churches.All three of these churches have needed a lot of repairs in the past year or so,but people have raised a lot of money and all of the churches are now in good repair.The churchyards are kept very nicely.All Saints Church at Holcombe Rogus has the most complete set of Parish records in the Diocese of Exeter.These date back to the Middle Ages.The Baptist Chapel at Holcombe Rogus closed a few years ago.There is a United Reformed Church at Westleigh.
